ZEC du Lac-au-Sable.title: ZEC du Lac-au-Sable
ZEC du Lac-au-Sable.byline: The ZEC du Lac-au-Sable is a controlled harvesting zone located in the unorganized territory of Mont-Élie, in the regional county municipality (RCM) of Charlevoix-Est, in the administrative region of the Quebec Region of Quebec.
